ivardefs.name: criteria
ivardefs.desc: The criteria for the stratifier. This must be the name of an expression defined within a referenced library.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: The identifier for the stratifier used to coordinate the reported data back to this stratifier.

ivardefs.name: path
ivardefs.desc: The path to an element that defines the stratifier, specified as a valid FHIR resource path.

properties.desc: The stratifier criteria for the measure report, specified as either the name of a valid CQL expression defined within a referenced library, or a valid FHIR Resource Path.
